botInfo:
Hello, I'm LoreBot! I'm and interactive encyclopedia for the fantasy world of Molidius. I am case-insensitive.
__Recognized Commands__:
parsingFailure: I was unable to parse '{}'. Bummer.

recognizedCommands.!Hakim: - Description of Hakim and Hakim's New and Previously Owned Magical Items
recognizedCommands.!Standards: - Standard Weights and Measurements, the foundation of currency

chirp._lorebot_thinks_not_m: You should go for it! The chance of a TPK is only [BAD_ODDS]%!
